price: Diejenigen, die sich hochmütig verhielten, sagten: Wir verleugnen ja das, woran ihr glaubt.
arabic: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّا بِٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: qāla alladhīna is'takbarū innā bi-alladhī āmantum bihi kāfirūna
